readable.title: 693164706_9624582e69
readable.content: A boy in a red hooded-coat is riding a pool broom like a horse in an empty pool . a little boy wearing a raincoat plays with a mop . A little kid in a red jacket riding a broom like a horse . Boy in raincoat straddle stick outside . The child in raingear is dragging a broom through a puddle .
